definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
to save/to get rid of (so saving space)
to prevent or treat a disease
to die/to be done with this world

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火车正朝他们驶过来，两个小男孩却浑然不知。

sentences.english: Vernet glanced at the key but made no move to touch it.
sentences.chinese: 韦尔内看了一眼那把钥匙，却没有去动它。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允许酷刑的人却不会受到任何处罚。

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某个领域里最优秀，却又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: But those justifications have an incontestable value in their own day.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些辩解在当时却具有必要的意义。

sentences.english: The horse's strides are shorter than at the other canters, without losing elasticity and cadence.
sentences.chinese: 马的步幅比其他几种跑步较短，但却不失弹性与节奏。

sentences.english: I love it most , making me calm and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 此生最爱的东西，我爱她到狂热，她却令我心静。

sentences.english: Has carved out a pen and a round of bitter and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 却刻出了一支又一支挥绕不去的苦涩和甜蜜。

sentences.english: Tarrou, the chief fighter against the disease, is infected and dies.
sentences.chinese: 对抗疾病的先锋塔鲁却染病身亡。

sentences.english: Slipper dream compared to the people, Kate has overturned that idea.
sentences.chinese: 相比人们的水晶鞋梦，凯特却颠覆了这种观念。

sentences.english: Brief is life, but love is long.
The people, however, continued to sacrifice at the high places, but only to the Lord their God.
sentences.chinese: 百姓却仍在丘坛上献祭，只献给耶和华他们的神。

sentences.english: But she did not tell her husband Nabal.
sentences.chinese: 这事她却没有告诉丈夫拿八。

sentences.english: As to whether this accords with legal principle, it is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 但是否符合法律原理，却值得商榷。

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是关于空气污染与静脉血栓关系的数据却很有限。

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府却因为为人民带来了稳定和财富而深得民心。

definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
